timeline.message:
Assert remote read stats after file is fully cached

This ensures no pending remote reads are still in progress

timeline.bodyText: why is getAsyncDownloadedMb be guaranteed to go up from beforeAsyncDownloadedMb to beforeAsyncDownloadedMb + 1?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
why is getAsyncDownloadedMb be guaranteed to go up from beforeAsyncDownloadedMb to beforeAsyncDownloadedMb + 1

test file has exactly 1MB, so the counter should increase by this much
replies.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: Isn't it possible that counter would flip before whole file is downloaded? (not sure if that matters very much)
replies.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText:
Isn't it possible that counter would flip before whole file is downloaded?

It shouldn't happen. In each test we assert that whole file gets downloaded asynchronously before continuing, so there should be no pending counter updates.
replies.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: The observed counter increase can still be from the time when file was still being downloaded. Right?
replies.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText:
The observed counter increase can still be from the time when file was still being downloaded. Right?

Since the file is 1MB, then when the counter bumps, then file should already be downloaded.
replies.author: sopel39
